servinfo.title: Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Timing Chain Cover Components:For M16A Engine with VVT

item.ptxt: Keep working table, tools and hands clean while overhauling.
Use special care to handle aluminum parts so as not to damage them.
Do not expose removed parts to dust. Keep them always clean.

s1.ptxt: Remove engine assembly from vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Remove P/S pump and A/C compressor (if equipped) drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Remove water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine) .
Remove crankshaft pulley bolt.
To lock crankshaft pulley (1), use special tool with it as shown in the figure.
Remove crankshaft pulley (1).
If it is hard to remove, use special tools as shown in the figure.
Remove cylinder head cover referring to Cylinder Head Cover Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Remove oil pan referring to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Remove water pump pulley.
Remove A/C compressor bracket and P/S pump bracket from cylinder block.
Remove oil gallery pipes No.2 (1) and No.3 (2).
Remove water outlet pipe (1) from timing chain cover.
Remove timing chain cover (2).
Remove oil control valve from timing chain cover referring to Oil Control Valve Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT , if necessary.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Timing Chain Cover Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT

s1.ptxt: Clean sealing surface on timing chain cover, cylinder block and cylinder head.
Remove oil, old sealant and dust from sealing surface.
Install oil seal (1) to timing chain cover, if removed.

attention3.ptxt: When installing new oil seal, press fit to timing chain cover (2) by using special tool (bearing installer) as shown in the figure.

s1.ptxt: Install oil control valve to timing chain cover referring to Oil Control Valve Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Apply sealant “A” to mating surface of cylinder and cylinder head and “B” to mating surface of timing chain cover as shown in the figure.

spec.title: Sealant amount for timing chain cover

s1.ptxt: Apply engine oil to oil seal lip, then install timing chain cover (1). Tighten bolts and nut to specified torque.

attention3.ptxt: Before installing timing chain cover, check that pin is securely fitted.

torqueitem.t-part: Timing chain cover bolt and nut

s1.ptxt: Apply engine oil to new O-rings and install them to water outlet pipe (2).
Install water outlet pipe (2) to timing chain cover (1).
Install new O-ring (1) to oil gallery pipes No.2 (2) and No.3 (3).
Install oil gallery pipes No.2 and No.3 to cylinder head (4) and timing chain cover (5).
Tighten bolts to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Oil gallery pipe No.2 and No.3 bolt

s1.ptxt: Install water pump pulley.
Install oil pan referring to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Install cylinder head cover referring to Cylinder Head Cover Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Install crankshaft pulley (1). Tighten bolt (2) to specified torque. To lock crankshaft pulley, use special tool with it as shown in the figure.
Install water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine) .
Install P/S pump and A/C compressor drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Install engine assembly to vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:For M16A Engine with VVT .
